job.title: Full Stack Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pstrongAbout UsstrongppNoteworthy AI provides artificial intelligence vehiclemounted hardware and cloud software that helps electric utilities better mitigate risks related to extreme weather events Our solution Inspector mounts on utility fleet vehicles and uses cameras and onboard computer vision to inventory and localize grid assets their components and possible defects Our solution substantially improves on legacy processes while helping utilities increase efficiency and reduce costppbrppstrongAbout YoustrongppYou are not afraid to roll up your sleeves to be an integral part of a fastgrowing startup that is playing a critical role in helping to keep the electric grid energized and resilient against climaterelated eventsppbrppstrongWhat you will be doingstrongpulliSolving object detection instance segmentation and event detection problemsliliTraining and optimizing models for use on embedded systemsliliOwning code testing deployment and maintenanceliliManaging external engineering resourcesliulpbrppstrongWhat skills and experience you needstrongppWe value your life experience and proven ability to overcome obstacles more than your credentials or the previous employers on your resume What you have accomplished in your work and the path that you traveled to get there is what matters most to usppbrppWhile we dont have a strict set of background requirements we are looking for people with experience inppbrpulliSupervised machine learning for object detectionliliC andor Python developmentliliNvidia Jetson and ROSROS2 experience is a plusliliMachine vision camera  lens configuration is a plusliulpbrppstrongWe are also looking for people withstrongpulliAn ability to adapt solve problems and quickly learn new skillsliliCreativity an ability to wear multiple hats and collaborate with a growing teamliliAn ability to identify tradeoffs between various challenges and requirements such as power limitations memory limitations execution speed user experience software development speed and software maintainabilityliliGood communication and interpersonal skillsliulpbrppstrongWhat we offerstrongpulliCompetitive salary equity and benefitsliliProfessional development and leadership opportunitiesliliFlexible scheduleliliNoteworthy AI is a remote first companyliulpbrppIn alignment with our core beliefs Noteworthy AI is an equal opportunity employer EOE and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sexual orientation gender identity national origin disability status protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawp
